subject: Re: All In One Device
author: seanjankowski1
full_text:
Sure RetroCom,

According to WORLDITC there are many different devices using different
aspects of the radio and white-noise spectrum. Constantine Raudive
used germanium diodes to capture EVPs. Siedle built his psychophone,
George Meeks had the Spiricom tone device. Now you have the diode for
white noise, radio wave HF static, and a tone device. I am attempting
to build an all in one audio recording and communication device. I am
doing this to see if by having a combined unit you can get contact
with either one or the other or perhaps multiple contacts at one time.
